mapper.insert: insert into board (num,userid, b_gu, up_cate, down_cate,b_subject, b_content ,b_tag) values (boardsq.nextval, #{userid}, #{b_gu}, ${up_cate},${down_cate},#{b_subject},#{b_content}, #{b_tag})
mapper.select: select num,userid, b_gu, up_cate, down_cate,b_subject, b_content ,b_tag,b_writedate from board where b_gu=#{b_gu} order by num desc
select num,userid, b_gu, up_cate, down_cate,b_subject, b_content ,b_tag,b_writedate from board where num=#{param1}
